help.description:
An easy way to find out the quick answer to ANY yes or no question!!!
You won't believe it yourself. Spoopy
help.usage:
`!8ball <question>` *(alias `!tellme`)*
`question` - The question you are eager to ask

help.description:
Nuuuu I'm so ticklish!!!! >~<
Tickle someone
Cuddle someone and give them a warm feeling
Snuggle someone and die from the cuteness!!! >3<

Make Trixie announce streamers when they go live.
Works only with Picarto at the moment.
help.usage:
`!alert <page url> <?channel>` - Subscribe Trixie to a Picarto channel! *(alias `!alert add`)*
`page url` - copy the url of the stream page and paste it in here
`channel` - optional- the channel to post the alert to later. If omitted will be this channel

`!alert remove <page url>` - unsubscribe Trixie from a Picarto channel

`!alert list` - list all active streaming alerts

help.description: Generates ascii art from an image
help.usage:
`!ascii <?url>`
`url` - optional- Url to an image. Or add an attachment to your message

help.description: Get you a cat fact that will help you raise your babies better <3
Gets the bot technical information. Nothing all that interesting.
Get some statistics from Trixie regarding herself
Search images on Derpibooru. If used in non-nsfw channels, it will only show safe posts. The bot will automatically filter posts containing content violating Discord's Community Guidelines.
help.usage:
`!derpi` *(alias `!db`)*

`!derpi random <?amount> <query>` *(alias `!derpi`)*
`amount` - optional- number ranging from 1 to 5 for how many results to return
`query` - a query string. Uses Derpibooru's syntax (<https://derpibooru.org/search/syntax>)

`!derpi top <?amount> <query>`

`!derpi latest <?amount> <query>`

`!derpi first <?amount> <query>`

help.description: Search images on e621. If used in non-nsfw channels, it will only show safe posts. The bot will automatically filter posts containing content violating Discord's Community Guidelines.
help.usage:
`!e621`

`!e621 random <?amount> <query>` *(alias `!e621`)*
`amount` - optional- number ranging from 1 to 5 for how many results to return
`query` - a query string. Uses E621's syntax (<https://e621.net/help/show/tags>)

`!e621 latest <?amount> <query>`

`!e621 top <?amount> <query>`

`!e621 popular <?timerange> <?amount>`
`timerange` - optional- Popular by 'day', 'week' or 'month'. Default: 'week'

`!gif <query>` - returns the top result for the given `query` *(alias `!gif top`)*
`query` - What type of gif you want to have

`!gif random <query>` - returns a random gif for the given `query`

`!gif trending` - returns a random trending gif

`!help <?command>` *(alias `!trixie`, `!h`)*
`command` - optional- The name of the command you want help for. Whole command list if omitted

help.description: Get some gud quality horse pussi OwO
Gets you only a true incorrect my little pony quote. Parsed from https://incorrectmylittleponyquotes.tumblr.com
Query the MLP Wikia for fun! Everything there: ALL the ponies, ALL the episodes, ALL the places.
help.usage:
`!mlp <query>` - come look it up with me owo *(alias `!pony`)*
`query` - what you would like to look up

help.description:
Check on what package your buddy is carrying~ (or you are caring)
Randomy generated penis size.
help.usage:
`!penis <?mention>` *(alias `!cock`, `!dick`)*
`mention` - optional- User who's penis you wish to ~~pleasure~~ measure

`!penis leaderboard` - Shows where you are in the penis size ranking

help.description: A whole easy to use role manager. Configure roles everyone can add themselves.
help.usage:
`!role <role> <?user mention 1> <?user mention 2> ...` - to add roles *(alias `!rank`, `!role add`)*
`role` - The role you would like to have added
`user mention` - optional- this is irrelevant to you, if you don't have rights to manage roles yourself

`!role remove <role> <?user mention 1> <?user mention 2> ...` - to remove
`role` - The role you would like to have removed
`user mention` - This is irrelevant to you, if you don't have rights to manage roles yourself

`!role available` - Show all public roles that you can add to yourself.

Admin Area:

help.description: Finds the source of an image on e621's and Derpibooru's database

help.usage:
`!smol <string|user>` *(alias `!small`)*
`string|user` - text or user to smollerize uwu

help.description:
What would Trump say?
Gets a random Trump quote
help.usage:
`!trump <?@mention>`
`@mention` - optional- If mentioned a user, command will return a personalized quote

help.description: Make Trixie join the user's current voice channel and read the `message` out aloud.
help.usage:
`!tts <message>`
`message` - The message to be read out by Trixie

help.description: This tool helps you manage your waifus with ease!
help.usage:
`!waifu` - Show all waifus you have claimed

`!waifu claim <@mention>` - Claim the person you mentioned if not already claimed.

`!waifu unclaim <@mention>` - Unclaim the person you mentioned if already claimed.

`!waifu steal <@mention>` - Steals a random waifu with a chance of 5%. Cooldown: 5 minutes
`@mention` - The waifu you want to perform actions on

`!waifu escape` - Don't like your new owner or would rather be free? Simply run away! ... with a small 5% chance. Cooldown: 5 minutes

`!waifu trade <@your waifu> <@other waifu>` - Trade `your waifu` with `other waifu`
`@your waifu` - Must be one of your waifus. This one will be traded
`@other waifu` - Must be someone's waifu. This is the one you want to get

help.description:
Autoban allows admins to make sure to keep specific users out of the server, even if they create a new account*
Patterns use the glob pattern documentation. It is an easy to understand text pattern matching solution. Check https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glob_(programming)#Syntax for the info.

* If in the pattern it's been made sure it would match these new similar accounts
help.usage:
`!autoban` - view the autoban patterns of this server

`!autoban add <pattern>` - add a pattern banning joining users if they match it
`pattern` - Pattern to filter out by

`!autoban remove <pattern>` - remove a pattern again

`!config <?parameter> <?value>` - view the Trixie's config in this server *(alias `!cfg`, `!opts`)*
`parameter` - optional- view only this parameter's config
`value` - optional- set a parameter in Trixie's config. "default" for default config

`!prefix <?prefix>` - vue Trixie's prefix in this server
`prefix` - optional- set the prefix in Trixie's config. "default" for default prefix `(!)`

help.description:
Trixie can collect deleted for up to 7 days, so you always know what's going on in your server behind your back.
Command enabled by default. Soon option to turn it off
help.usage:
`!deleted` - List all deleted messages from the last 7 days

`!deleted clear` - Clears list of deleted messages

help.description: Disable Trixie from listening to some commands or channels
help.usage:
`!disable`

`!disable channel <#channel>`
`#channel` - A channel or multiple channels

`!disable command <command name>`
`command name` - The name of a command or a space seperated list of commands

help.description: If you have disabled channels or commands for Trixie, you can enable them here again.
help.usage:
`!enable`

`!enable channel <#channel>`
`#channel` - A channel or multiple channels

`!enable command <command name>`
`command name` - The name of a command or a space seperated list of commands

help.description: Trixie supports multiple different languages, including `en`, `de`, `hu`. Here you can set them in your server
help.usage:
`!locale <?locale> <?channel>` - view the Trixie's locales in this server
`locale` - optional- set a global locale. If `channel` is given, sets as channel-only locale
`channel` - optional- set a channel to be a unique locale

help.description: Mute/Blacklist specific words in this server
help.usage:
`!mute <phrase>` *(alias `!mute add`)*
`phrase` - Word or phrase to be muted/blacklisted

`!mute remove <phrase>`
`phrase` - Word or phrase to be unmuted/unblacklisted

`!mute clear` - Remove all muted words

`!mute list` - list all muted words and phrases

`!unmute <phrase>`
`phrase` - Word or phrase to be unmuted/unblacklisted

`!timeout <time> <user mention 1> <user mention 2> ...`
`time` - timeout length. E.g.: `1h 20m 10s`, `0d 100m 70s` or `0.5h` are valid inputs
`user mention` - user to timeout. Multiple users possible

`!timeout remove <user mention 1> <user mention 2> ...`
`user mention` - user to remove timeout from. Multiple users possible

`!timeout clear` - remove all timeouts

`!timeout list` - list all timeouts present at the moment

help.description: It's shortly before Christmas again! Have you been good this year, or will your potty mouth on Discord leave you with lump of coal in your stocking on Christmas day? It’s time to find out!
That's right, put it back where it was ノ( ゜-゜ノ)

Aw heck I'm gonna flip you upside down!
Flips a text or username upside down like a good boi

Oh sorry didn't mean to. Lemme just...!
Un-Flips a text or username like a real good boi who doesn't want you any trouble

Do something lewddd to another user.
All texts were submitted by other users. TrixieBot didn't take any part in creating those texts and we do our best efforts to remove harmful submissions, therefore all submissions must first be verified by one of my owners.
help.usage:
`!fuck <user>`
`user` - the username of the user to fuck

`!fuck add <text>` - Add your own phrase
`text` - the text the bot is supposed to say. It must contain `${name}` in the place the username should be set. E.g.: `!fuck add rides ${name}'s skin bus into tuna town`

help.description: Create a poll that users can vote on
help.usage:
`!poll <duration> <option 1>, <option 2>, ..., <option n>`
`duration` - Duration of the poll. E.g.: `1h 20m 10s`, `0d 100m 70s` or `0.5h` are valid inputs
`option` - a comma seperated list of options to vote for

help.description:
**TrixieBot costs $6 a month and a lot of time to maintain.**
If you like this bot, please consider giving the devs a little tip ❤
Returns the currently running version of TrixieBot
Gives a link to invite TrixieBot to your own server.
